name: Surya's Command
effect: Clears 1 house of Tamasic fog. Grants +2 Strength to Lagna Lord.
description: The absolute authority of the Sun. Highly effective against Saturnian debuffs, but burns Venus if placed in the same house.

name: Chandra's Shield
effect: Restores +5 Prana (Health) and neutralizes one Ashtamastha (8th house) curse.
description: Cooling and restorative. Essential for surviving the Sade Sati levels or heavy Maraka transits.

name: Mangal's Strike
effect: Deals 6 damage to an enemy Graha. If played in the 3rd or 6th house, deals double damage.
description: The fiery spear of the commander. Powerful, but playing it in the 4th or 7th house triggers a Mangal Dosha penalty to your own defenses.
